Description:
MODERN APPEAL WITH BAY VIEWS
This newly built modern home represents fantastic low maintenance living suitable for those looking to spend their time enjoying all the fabulous things that the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula has to offer including walking trails, pristine beaches and award winning wineries.
Downstairs comprises 2 bedrooms, a beautiful bathroom, laundry and sitting room leading out to a sunny courtyard whilst upstairs features a third bedroom and delightful kitchen, living & dining area with spectacular views of the bay, this really is the perfect opportunity to secure a brand new home suitable for weekend getaways or permanent living in a highly regarded pocket of Clifton Springs!

Description:
SUPERBLY SPACIOUS SPLIT LEVEL
With an abundance of style and plenty of space, this beautiful property is newly built and completed with attention to detail and ready to be called home. Featuring a superb split level floorplan making the most of approx. 586m2 parcel of land over three levels, this fabulous new home comprises four bedrooms all with BIR and Master suite with WIR & ensuite plus two separate living zones, both with expansive entertaining balconies providing ample room for the whole family as well as allowing privacy for quiet enjoyment. The upper level of the home features a stunning designer kitchen with an abundance of storage & quality fixtures and flows effortlessly to the dining and living space and opens out to a fantastic entertainers balcony which enjoys scenic views of Clifton Springs and beyond. The entire home is kept comfortable all year round with ducted heating and split system cooling whilst the outside enjoys a low maintenance garden perfect for the kids to run around in and double garage accommodation with drive thru access to the rear. If you are seeking a brand new quality built home in a sought after pocket of Clifton Springs then this is the one for you! Call for an inspection today.

Description:
Looking for a investment property?
Excellent opportunity to acquire this appealing three bedroom house with easy access to the town centre. Charming verandah entry.
Floating timber floors in the lounge & dining room.
Offering a modern kitchen with wall oven & plenty of cupboards.
Lovely under cover raised entertaining deck.
Plenty of backyard for the kids to run on 593 sqm of land.
Split system air conditioner.
Double lock up garage.
Solar power to assist with the energy bills.

Description:
Substantial Family Home in Quiet Court
Don't judge this book by its cover come along and inspect to appreciate the options ! Vendor keen to negotiate all reasonable offers. This large family home perfect for the growing family on 735m2. Nestled in a quiet court and adjacent to a treed reserve. Plenty of yard space for the kids to play. This home provides the option for the new owner to work from home or accommodate an extended family arrangement. Living areas are spacious with garden views from several rooms. Five generous sized bedrooms all with built in robes, two living areas and two separate bathrooms - this is a substantial home. Outdoor undercover area, chook house, vege garden and storage/workshop for all the garden tools.
Situated close to public transport, schools, shopping and the relaxing lifestyle choices of the Bellarine. Inspect now !

Description:
VIEWS AND THEN SOME
This lovely split level property features 3 bedrooms all with built in robes, 2 bathrooms; the main with a separate bath. The main living area has beautiful polished timber floors, timber cathedral ceiling, a split system air conditioner and opens up to the generous outdoor deck. The balcony is an entertainer's delight with a built in outdoor kitchen and overlooking the fully fenced rear yard. The fully appointed kitchen features stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher. There is also a generously sized double remote garage, chicken coup, a 9,000 litre rain water tank and a 3 kilowatt solar power unit. All of this within good walking distance to the boat ramp, golf course, walking tracks and more. Currently tenanted on a periodic basis.

Address: 43-47 High Ridge Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Country and Coastal Living With a View
Situated along the sought after location of High Ridge Drive, impeccable is one word to describe the extent of this estate! Located just over 3 acres with breathtaking views of Corio Bay, it hosts a private tennis court, manicured garden, established hedges and a sizable paddock. It is a prestigious property that reflects maturity, luxury and quality, offering the best of both coastal and rural living. Nothing has been overlooked!
A sweeping driveway will see you arrive at this exclusive, luxury 4 bedroom family home.
Offering an abundance of living, dining and entertainment areas, walking through the grand entrance into the formal living room complete with open fireplace and beautiful bay windows, you will be immersed in the picturesque views of the surrounding manicured gardens. On the other side of the entrance is a reception area that leads guests into a more intimate sitting room or study.
Showcasing a separate formal dining room, this residence boasts a sleek modern Hamptons style kitchen with Miele appliances, an abundance of storage, exquisite white Corian bench tops, and a further two dining areas, one of which opens up onto the spacious main living room. From this room you will be mesmerized with an outlook across Corio Bay, You Yangs and the estate.
At the far end of the residence is the master wing with private balcony (bay views), generous his and her walk-in robes, opulent ensuite with a walk-in shower, twin vanities and soaker tub overlooking the grounds. Adding to this, you will find a further three double bedrooms with built-in robes, one with access to the main double bathroom.
Furthermore, be taken away with the impressive undercover, al fresco entertainment space that extends the possibilities to hold events all year round. Dine with friends and family, and watch the sunset over the dreamy landscape and Corio Bay.
This rare opportunity on the edge of Clifton Springs is connected to everything you'll ever need - close to the centre of town, beaches, parks, schools, sporting facilities and nearby Geelong.
- Security and intercom system
- Solar panels
- Double garage with undercover parking for two cars
- Ducted heating and vacuum, fireplace and split-systems
- Established orchard with farm-size water tank
- Fully-automated pergola for seasonal comfort
- Potential separate accommodation available underneath the house, possible gym or games room
- Idyllic rural life for a growing family
Insights: 43-47 High Ridge Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Equipped for the good life
This classically elegant home will indulge you upon entry. The front study area is perfect for those who like to work from home, separate from the main living areas of the house. The generous master suite has the benefit of an outlook onto the neat and well kept front garden. It also features it's very own spacious walk in robe and ensuite bathroom with toilet, shower and vanity.
A light filled formal lounge/rumpus area located in the middle of the home, a great space for the kids to watch their shows without disturbing the grown ups. Opposite is a formal dining room, capable of seating plenty.
The size of the open lounge area is enough to blow you away, big enough to place the grandest of lounge suites. Watch television, host parties or anything in between, with outdoor access for the furry members of the family. With features such as Westinghouse oven, cooktop and rangehood, breakfast bar and Asko dishwasher, the open plan kitchen and dining are able to suit your every need.
The two other bedrooms of the home feature their own built in robes, serviced by a main bathroom.
Outdoor entertaining is a piece of cake with the patio area extending from the side of the house, with plenty of space for a barbecue, fire pit or outdoor setting.
Enormous yard with more than enough room for a game of backyard cricket or two.
Only just around the corner from the beach.
Features include:
Double garage with single drive through yard access, ducted central heating, split system Fujitsu air conditioning
Insights: 23 Yarramundi Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Sensational Sea Change!
An attractive facade creates an anticipation for what is not only an eye catching residence but a property that delivers a wonderful warm welcoming 'home' feel. A fine example of a beautiful light and bright property which boasts an enviable orientation and spectacular water views.
A truly exclusive opportunity to secure a stunning residence which has been loved and adored by the same ownership since it was originally built
The primary living zone is bathed in natural light; a northerly orientation further promotes a light and bright 'feel'. A glass sliding door creates a seamless inside/outside living dynamic and showcases spectacular water views
A custom kitchen design serves up a wonderful practical zone; expansive benchtops, excellent storage solutions and stainless steel appliances. A defined dining space is flanked by a beautiful bay window
A 2nd independent living area provides further flexibility to what is already a very adaptable floor plan
3 spacious bedrooms; master is complete with ensuite and walk in robe. The 3rd bedroom boasts impressive built in custom cabinetry.
A double remote car garage features dual roller doors and rear yard access for the boat, trailer and/or the jet ski a genuine lifestyle property
Storybook style gardens are simply enchanting and create a tranquil setting
Without a doubt this home was built with no compromise; all the modern comforts and many more fine features to be discovered on inspection
Homes of this calibre, set within a peaceful court location boasting panoramic bay views are as rare as hen's teeth and I would encourage swift action if you wish to make this property 'home'.
Insights: 2 Wardoo Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Indoor and Outdoor Lifestyle - Superb!
An immaculate presentation of a beautiful 4-bedroom home with all a family or entertainer could hope for.
Encompassed by verandahs, well-designed living areas with a neutral colour pallet fitted with quality appliances and features. The formal living area features an open fireplace and adjoins the dining or sitting room area. The kitchen is perfectly situated in the home with two dining room options either side with a dishwasher, ample storage space and an enviable Butler's pantry; perfect for those who love to entertain or a large family.
Master bedroom with built-in robes, ensuite with twin vanities, 3 further bedrooms are generous in size with built-in robes. The undercover outdoor entertaining area is 5.7m X 5m (approx.), well designed and equipped for all seasons and occasions; spa bath with safety glass enclosure, flued range hood for cooking and bi-fold doors leading to the rear yard and low maintenance garden areas. The lock-up garage and adjoining car space complete this beautiful family home.
Extra features include:
Wooden Bamboo Flooring
Flued Gas Heating
3.1KW Solar System

Description:
A Hidden Gem
Tucked away in this quiet avenue, you can tell this two storey, two bedroom and two bathroom home is special right from walking through the front door.
The huge front lounge is more than enough for all walks of life, with enough space for the biggest of furniture or entertaining plenty of guests.
An open kitchen and dining area, with perfect view of the garden, are next on the ground floor. A bathroom, complete with shower, toilet and vanity service the bottom level.
Upstairs you'll find two spacious bedrooms with built in robes and an absolutely enormous bathroom, with a spa. The master bedroom offers a water-view from its own balcony.
With it's hedge-lined driveway and mirror tinting on the rear doors, privacy is no longer an issue.
The property has a single lock up garage, low maintenance rainforest-style garden, garden shed, 1.5 kilowatt solar-panel system and is located only minutes from the beach.
Insights: 2/7 Maraboora Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 8 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
PRIVATE SANCTUARY WITH VIEWS
Sitting in a slightly elevated position with views of Corio Bay from the living room, is this lovely 3 bedroom home in highly sought after Clifton Springs with delightful manicured gardens, lovingly maintained and conveniently positioned with a bus stop on your doorstep! Featuring a functional floorplan this home is sure to please those looking to downsize or invest or alternatively, the first homebuyer looking to enjoy the wonderful lifestyle that the Bellarine Peninsula offers. The home is kept comfortable all year round with ducted heating, a wood fire and a split system and there is an abundance of storage space in the secure lock up garage.

Address: 27-29 Sea Haven Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Neat As A Pin
Nestled amidst the peninsula townships of Clifton Springs & Drysdale this neat as a pin family home is perfection in any ones eyes.
Set on a generous corner block of 623m2 in one of the quietest streets in the area and consisting of four bedrooms, main with full ensuite, you will have all the space in the world for the family or if youre in retirement, have the gran kids stay over and they wont be under your feet. Two living areas create just that bit more comfort.
The kitchen and dining areas are bright and functional with light floor tiles and contrasting dark benchtops, the dining area is complimented with a gorgeous bay window looking out to the north facing rear yard, the main living area is bathed in sunlight via the large windows, and the rear yard has enough space for the kids to play but is simple in presentation and low in maintenance.
The home is warm and inviting, superbly designed, and easily maintained. The double garage is entered from the Eastern end of the property whilst at the Western end there is side access to allow the boat and van to be stored behind secure gates.
Located near primary and secondary schools, central to Bellarines burgeoning wineries and cafés, a stones throw from beaches and fishing spots and shopping just around the corner, you would struggle to get anywhere better.
If you have considered the change to the Bellarine or you are looking to upsize, downsize, resize or just put the feet up, your search for the perfect peninsula home starts and finishes here.
Insights: 27-29 Sea Haven Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Family living without breaking the bank
Delightful open entryway leading to the spacious separate lounge & the first of four bedrooms. You can feel the warmth of the early afternoon sun as you relax in the living room.
Adding to that feeling of privacy with gorgeous garden views just outside the front window,.
Alcove dining room separate to the kitchen, with easy access between the two rooms.
Original kitchen features breakfast bar & informal casual dining/lounge offering a second family space.
Master bedroom with its own ensuite bathroom has a wonderful outlook of the backyard. The other three bedrooms, all with built in robes, make use of a central bathroom.
An expansive double carport means the family car is protected from the elements.
At approximately 644 sqm, the expansive parcel of land provides plenty of room with a garden shed for tools & a rustic cubby in the backyard.
With this much room, the possibilities are endless, whether that's outdoor entertaining, more shedding or anything in between the choice is yours.
Easy access to the boat ramp, Clifton Springs Bowls Club & golf course.

Address: 104 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
691m2 Corner Block
Treasured family home with 3 bedrooms or even a 4th bedroom, home office or study! The front door opens & you step inside to the lounge with bay windows & views of the You Yangs & bay plus reverse cycle split system with wood heater. Around the corner is a formal dining with yard views & sliding door to the kitchen. Kitchen has electric stove, range hood & double pantry. Also, another living area perfect for a second dining or family room with ceiling fan, sky light, electric heater & sliding doors to access the pergola. Down the hall is the 1st spacious bedroom with built in robes. Off to the side is the laundry. Further down is the central bathroom with separate shower & bath. Next is the master bedroom also has built in robes plus a full en-suite. Then follows a smaller living perfect for a parents retreat or kids playroom. Stepping down into the 3rd bedroom which is super-sized. The home office or study is off the double carport so clients can walk straight in. Outside you have 2 garden sheds plus a storage shed ideal for a workshop or man cave. Long yard with an undercover pergola entertaining area & landscaped garden. A bonus here is the double side gates perfect for the boat, caravan or trailer with its own driveway. Low maintenance front gardens on a 691m2 generous corner block.

Description:
Attention First Home Buyers And Investors!
The Feel:
Situated in a peaceful enclave surrounded by established properties, this updated 3BR home presents as an excellent entry point into a growing coastal market, opportunity for the discerning investor; or a relaxing bayside weekender with plenty of space for the boat and visitors! Neat as a pin and boasting easy care, low maintenance attributes, you’ll be hard pressed to find a better buy in this convenient central location.
The Facts:
- Neat and spacious, with two well defined living zones
- Modernised entertainers kitchen with ample storage
- Undercover outdoor patio, perfect for entertaining
- 3 brightly lit, roomy bedrooms, all with BIRs
- Master suite enjoys direct access to wet areas
- Updated central bathroom with separate W.C
- Utility room offering versatility as a home office
- Freestanding wood heater for optimal winter comfort
- Outstanding accommodation for 4 vehicles
- High set carport for caravans, boats and trailers
- Located close to Pinaroo Shopping Stripe for convenience
- Walking distance to the Dell, Springs Golf Club & Primary School
- Peaceful location, surrounded by established homes
The Owner Loves:
“We have loved the central location giving us the convenience of being able to walk everywhere. It’s a nice quiet area, with little disruption through the busy summer months. The home itself is low maintenance and very easy to live in.”

Address: 85 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
You Had Me At Hello!
It's hard not to let this humble home tug on the heart strings, why? Because it feels like home from the moment you walk up the garden path. 85 Country Club Drive exudes an inviting feeling perhaps because of the cozy footprint or the light filled and airy renovated spaces, it's an ideal package which will tick off the criteria for the majority of the market.
A huge highlight of the home is the stunning location. Walking distance to the beach, golf course and the Dell you have no option but to inherit the fantastic lifestyle that is on offer.
This fastidiously kept home comprises 3 bedrooms, all with robes, and the master with access to the two-way bathroom. The light filled living area, enjoying modest bay glimpses flows nicely into the kitchen dining area. The kitchen is equipped with soft close cabinetry, new Westinghouse stainless steel oven and range hood. A fully fitted new laundry stems off the kitchen with external access.
All the hard work has been done, a clean crisp yet simple renovation means that you can move in right away or lease it out. Features include premium ducted heating and cooling, new 5kw solar panel system with battery capability, re-painted, new floor furnishings, new internal lighting, single lock up garage with rear access and plenty of room for cars, boats, caravan and everything in between. The home is set back offering a private front entrance and a very secure backyard which is landscaped and shaded with established trees.
A truly rare package in a sought-after location, on offer at an affordable price. An inspection is a must to appreciate this compact home.

MADE TO STAND THE TEST OF TIME
Built circa 1976, in a unique cream clay brick, is this family home with the benefit of a large nature reserve as one of its neighbours. Comprising a formal entrance, a separate lounge with built in book shelves and gas heater. The kitchen has provision for a dishwasher and range hood and electric upright stove, which is open to the meals area with permanent cabinetry, that then leads out to a sun room with views over the park. Outside offers a pergola, garden shed, potting room, rain water tank and some beautifully established shrubs and fruit trees. Within 5 minutes from the golf course, boat ramp, wineries, restaurants, cafes and sea front. Selling in as is condition and any reasonable offer will be considered.

Description:
Immaculately Presented Home With Stunning Outdoor Entertaining
Located in a quiet street of a well-established part of Clifton Springs, this beautifully presented 4-bedroom home sits on a spacious block of 599m2 with perfect family living and entertainment in mind. The home offers many options on a low-maintenance landscaped garden.
Within close proximity to the Drysdale Shopping Center, primary and secondary schools, Adventure Park, fabulous beaches, wineries and restaurants throughout the Bellarine Peninsula.
The spacious master bedroom is at the front of the house and includes a generous-sized WIR with detailed cabinetry and high end ensuite.
Three further bedrooms all with BIRs serviced by a modern family bathroom complete with full size bath.
The custom designed kitchen features stainless steel appliances, generous benchtops, island bench, soft close draws and electrical cupboard. The open plan kitchen is well-equipped for the chef of the family flowing into the dining zone suitable for all.
Other features include a well-designed laundry with plenty of storage, ducted central heating and R/C split system.
You'll be impressed by the large alfresco entertaining area, built in BBQ surrounded by a private garden including a children's play haven.
An added bonus of a Studio detached from the main home perfect for an office space.
Plenty of parking providing for an additional car, boat, trailer or caravan.
This property is ideally suited to permanent residents or adding to an investment portfolio.
$450 Rent pw approx.
Call today to find out more. You won't be disappointed.

Description:
LIGHT FILLED HOME AWAITING ITS NEXT CHAPTER
Set on a generous allotment of approximately 640m2, this home offers a fantastic opportunity for all buyers alike, combining both size with a flexible floorplan. For those seeking a quiet, comfortable and convenient lifestyle where your investment is assured there is no need to look further. This family home has been lovingly maintained over the years. A light-filled lounge room is complete with gas heating. The kitchen is the heart of the home being centrally located, overlooking both dining area and sitting area which includes a built in TV, a split system and gas fire place offering comfort all year round. There is direct access from the kitchen with doors opening to outside patio yard, featuring a secure low maintenance garden. Offering three bedrooms, central 2 way bathroom, separate toilet plus laundry. The large carport allows access to the back yard where you'll find two garden sheds, a water tank and more room for a garage or extension STCA.
Located within close proximity to schools, jetty, golf club and parklands. With the amount of scope this property offers, it certainly should attract interest from first home buyers, young families and savvy investors seeking a property with so much potential. An inspection truly is a must!
Insights: 36 Maraboora Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.
